info.title: libresign
info.description: ✍️ Self-hosted document signer using digital certificate

get.summary: Get a demo PDF file to be used by test purpose
get.description:
To use this endpoint is necessary to enable the debug mode in your instance. To do this, run the command:
`occ config:system:set debug --value true --type boolean`
This router is used to be possible render pages with /f/, is a workaround at frontend side to identify pages with authenticated accounts

parameters.description: Signer UUID

parameters.name: nodeIds[]
parameters.description: The list of nodeIds (also called fileIds). It's the ids of files at Nextcloud

parameters.name: status[]
parameters.description: Status could be none or many of 0 = draft, 1 = able to sign, 2 = partial signed, 3 = signed, 4 = deleted.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Start date of signature request (UNIX timestamp)

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: End date of signature request (UNIX timestamp)

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Name of the column to sort by

parameters.name: sortDirection
parameters.description: Ascending or descending order

parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

get.summary: Return the thumbnail of a LibreSign file

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: The nodeId of document

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: Width of generated file

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Height of generated file

parameters.name: a
parameters.description: Crop, boolean value, default false

parameters.name: forceIcon
parameters.description: Force to generate a new thumbnail

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: To force a given mimetype for the file

parameters.name: mimeFallback
parameters.description: If we have no preview enabled, we can redirect to the mime icon if any

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass
